channel.title: Pages on Krita Site
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Krita Site

item.title: Mailing Lists
item.description: Krita’s Development Mailing List Krita uses a KDE mailing list for all developer and user communication At one time, Krita was called “KImageShop”.

item.title: Donations
item.description: Krita is a Free and Open Source application. Krita is mostly developed by an international team of enthusiastic volunteers. We welcome donations from Krita users to support all the work weâ€™re doing!

item.title: Artist Interviews
item.description: Krita Artist Interviews We host interviews with artists who use Krita as their main creative tool. We ask questions like what they are doing, their stories with art, and how they feel about using Krita.

item.title: Contracting
item.description: Development Contracting Boudewijn Rempt Software has worked with several companies and studios to develop features and improvements to Krita. This is a commercial service, and we do not take feature requests or suggestions without signing a contract.

item.title: Monthly Subscription
item.description: Why a Monthly Subscription? Individual donations are great, but the development fund gives us a regular income, which makes it possible to plan for the future.
